At the close of the Levering hall
membership ,campaign on Monday,
471 Hopkins men had enrolled in the
campus Y, as againgt the original _
goal of 400. The drive increased the
Y funds by $951.

have come to realize the value of the
Y and its activities. He added that
the total number of members enrolled
this fall in the Levering drive surpasses all previous records, in spite

size of the student body.

enrollments gotten by those participating in the drive were shown gaily
